name: Flight Rising Derg Evener
description: Displays your dragons in five rows of four for more precise arranging!

user.name: Inkay
user.about: Hallo! I'm just a 28-year-old cat-obsessed lady who makes simple CSS scripts. :)

additional_info:
This script still displays all 20 dragons on each page, but in a 4x5 arrangement versus a 5x4. Makes the page a bit longer to scroll through. Sorry for the screenshot's quality! I tried my best, aha.

Note that this changes all users' clans, not just yours! However, if you would prefer to just change your lair's layout, add your user ID to the end of the URL within the code.
